scenario_text.value: It looks ready for a fight.

(It’s hostile, but I don’t think it’s working
with Archnemon.)

(I don’t wish it harm, and I’m not looking
for a fight. Maybe we can talk?)
(What to do about this hostile monster?)

I’ll try driving it off. Maybe if I use this
dirt clod...
Takuma! You really teed her off now!
Wha’? Guess that was a mistake...
Damn, guess we have to fight!

We won’t hurt you. See? Hands in the air and
everything.

(It’s not bristling like before... I guess it
got the picture?)

Sorry we frightened you back there. Do you
want to come with us?

There’s a bunch of critters like you back at
our home base.
It looks happy! Good going, Takuma!
(I’m just glad we didn’t have to fight.)
